Peregrine falcons are the fastest birds, reaching speeds of over 200 mph (322 km/h) during hunting dives, thanks to their aerodynamic bodies and specialized anatomy. They primarily hunt other birds mid-air using strong talons and excellent eyesight, and they often dismember their prey in flight.
